==Trivia==
* Muhuru was the name of the [[Children of Echoes|Nanatzcayan]] hero [[Sundjatta]]'s [[Saurian#Historical|Stegosaur]] companion - a [[Saurian]] no longer found in the current age Natlan.<ref>{{Ref/Weapon|Mountain-Bracing Bolt}}</ref> Muhuru accompanied Sundjatta and the other heroes lead by Tenoch in a battle against the abyss.<ref>{{Ref/Weapon|Talking Stick}}</ref>
* The [[Furnishing]] "[[Tequemecan Treasures]]" is designed to resemble Muhuru's Gemporium.

===Etymology===
* {{W|Muhuru Bay}} is a town in Kenya. It shares its name with a [https://cryptidarchives.fandom.com/wiki/Muhuru dinosaur-like cryptid] spotted in Kenya.
